sentences.sentence: The value of Japan, America, Britain and India increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2016.
There is an unusual rise in 2015 of America.
Britain has the lowest average value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015 and 2016.

sentences.sentence: The value of Japan, America, Britain and India increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2016.
There is an unusual rise in 2015 of America.
Britain has the lowest average value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015 and 2016.
